nodes.text: Atrisian Basic was a language and writing system within the galaxy. The pro-Imperial propaganda poster Imperius Unitada ober Totallex featured an Atrisian Basic motto that literally translated to "Empire united over all."
Atrisian Basic bears similarities to real-world Latin. In Star Wars Legends, the Tionese language bears similarities to real-world Greek.

The 2017 canon reference book Star Wars: The Last Jedi: The Visual Dictionary mentions that the Elite Praetorian Guard seen in that year's film, Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi, trace their name back to the 14th Atrisian Emperor of Kitel Phard. In the real world, the Praetorian Guard were the elite bodyguards of ancient Roman emperors.
